thread.title: Dolphins, sea lions, turtles found dead at Mexico island
thread.title_full: Dolphins, sea lions, turtles found dead at Mexico island | News24

author: news24.com
title: Dolphins, sea lions, turtles found dead at Mexico island
text:
Mexico City - Mexican authorities are investigating the deaths of 36 marine animals that washed up on an island in the Gulf of California.
The federal environmental prosecutor's office says in a statement on Thursday that 21 dolphins, 4 sea lions and 11 sea turtles were discovered at Altamura Island, off Sinaloa state.
Their decomposing remains were found on the beaches and floating in the water by guardians who patrol the area.
The private island is home to ranching and tourist concerns as well as a sanctuary for flora and fauna, with dunes stretching around 20km.
